descriptionLong:
Arnold's Farm Granola Pink Lady Apple & Cinnamon is a source of fibre, has no artificial colours or flavours and very high in whole grain. Proudly Australian made.

Golden Oat Granola

Our granola is made with Aussie oats, crunchy pepitas and diced apples, baked in a delicious cinnamon syrup. 

- Source of fibre
- Very high in whole grain
- Real fruit
- Made with Aussie Oats
- Suitable for vegetarians & vegans
- No artificial colours or flavours
- One 45g serve of Arnold's Farm Pink Lady Apple & Cinnamon Granola contributes 55% of the 48g whole grain Daily Target Intake. 

At Arnold's Farm, we believe that good food should be enjoyed every day. That's why we're proud that our mueslis have been loved by Aussie families since 1983!

Our dedicated team use wholesome, locally grown oats and grains, the way nature intended, to create a range of mueslis, granolas and clusters that are simply delicious.

attributes.ingredients: Whole Grain Oats (59%), Glucose, Golden Syrup (Sugar, Water), Raw Sugar, Rice Puffs (Rice Flour, Sugar, Salt, Golden Syrup), Sunflower Oil, Dried Apple (Preservative (223)), Pepitas (2%), Pink Lady Apple (2%), Cinnamon (0.5%), Natural Flavour, Ginger Power, Antioxidant (Vitamine E).
attributes.dietary: Contains: Gluten. May contain: Milk, Peanuts, Sesame, Sulphites, Soy, Lupin, Pine Nut, Almond, Cashew, Hazelnut, Macadamia, Pecan, Brazil Nut, Pistachio, Walnut, Wheat. Health and product warnings: Great care has been taken to remove all shells and stones from all of our natural ingredients, however some may remain.
attributes.storage_instructions: Store unopened in a cool, dry place at less than 25C. Once opened, store in an airlight container away from direct sunlight.
